Attributes.description: Use of cartography in primary research applications. Discussion of contemporary topics in cognitive, social, and technical cartography and data visualization.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: One of GEOB 270, GEOS 270, GEOB 372, GEOS 372.
